sub_title: Graphic designer | Designer PPT | PowerPoint | Figma | Photoshop | Illustrator | Formula 1 cart among designers fast and chic.
summary:
Creative Graphic Designer with 3+years experience in B2B market. I help companies like Procter & Gamble, PWC, SAP, Danone, Schlumberger translate ideas into visual solutions for business.

You may not believe it, but during my career I have developed more than 2000 presentations and about 100 templates from scratch for 100 largest companies in Russia. My visual and structural solutions help clients promote their brands, attract new customers and hold events.
My other area of expertise is the development of a full cycle of design identities from determining the client's business needs to a ready-made brandbook. I'm always on the run to improve my skills, the last program I started learning was Blender.
I'm not afraid of a good test. I had complex projects during which I learned how to edit videos, create a 3D model of an object, or delve into motion design in the process.
Currently, I am not only focusing on creating something visually appealing, exciting and easy to use, but also strive to educate others by sharing my experience with colleagues and clients.

In addition to creating presentations and designing, my experience includes:
- Reduced project time by 50% through the introduction of new products in the ppt department
- An educational course has been developed to improve the quality of presentations decrease PPTX department workload
- Conducted more than 20 online training webinars on business presentations creation (design, storyline, structure) with more than 1000 participants

I'm excited about the opportunities where I can apply my design experience to help companies competently visualizing their ideas that affect their positioning in the global market.

I'm a big fan of Formula 1. I've been rooting for the Ferrari team for the last three seasons. And my dream remains to watch the race live.

I love connecting with new people, give me a shout at kakovleva23@gmail.com, in telegram @KsKoz or here on LinkedIn!

Web-design | Landing design | Typography Calligraphy| Concept creation | Graphic Designer | Presentation | PowerPoint | Figma | Photoshop | Illustrator | Movavi Video | Blander | After Effects | 3D-Max | SketchBook

profile_positions.description:
MTS, Russia
Developed a template and created/designed more than 200 slides for a strategic session between the Moscow and regional offices of the company, which allowed her to structurally present an annual development plan. 

FabLite Electronic, Russia
Developed a visual concept and drew a new visual guideline. Drawing a 3D model for a scientific conference, which allowed attracting 40 new potential customers and a total income of 10 mln rubles.

Cointelegraph, Georgia
Design a commercial presentation and improved the visual concept, which allowed to attract new investments of 500 thousand dollars. 

ONLINE HAB, Kazakhstan
Developed a landing page, visual concept and create a commercial offer that attracted 
more than 50 new customers.
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer

profile_positions.description:
-	Organized and supervised the work of the PPT department, which created 1000+ presentations for clients over the period of 2 years in cross-functional collaboration with Project Manager, Product Manager, Event, Sales department

-	Conducted more than 20 online training webinars on business presentations creation (design, storyline, structure) with more than 1000 participants 

-	Developed an internal educational course to improve the quality of presentations in the company — 
55 people took part and decrease PPTX department workload

-	introduced and established innovative solution for the team (Networking Miro descs), which allowed to increase analytics department efficiency 

-	Developed the department strategy, established and conducted hiring process, Introduced checklists guides and manuals to unify work processes with neighboring departments.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader Power Point

profile_positions.description:
-	Developed and rendered more than 2000 visualized presentations for case championships, public speeches, career courses and webinars 

-	Created more than 100 templates presentation for more than 90% of the best employers in the world, in order to preserve the correct corporate identity of the company and the event 

-	Developed from scratch an educational course on creating a business presentation, which was attended by 300 people, including methodology, material design and home exercises
